data.title: Maroon Bells Transportation - Summer Bus Schedule
data.meta_description: Beat the crowds and enjoy hassle-free parking with RFTA as the Maroon Bells Bus service runs every day starting Mid June through early October.
data.text:
Maroon Bells reservations are released on a rolling basis:

Parking reservations from May 15 through June, and 2024 Shuttle reservations will be available for purchase beginning Tuesday, March 5th at 8 AM Mountain Time. The remaining season parking reservations will be released on a rolling schedule.

DATES:

The Maroon Bells Shuttles will operate from May 24 through October 20, 2024.

TIMES & CHECK IN

The shuttle runs every 15 minutes from 7am to 1pm and then every 20 minutes from 1pm to 3pm. There are no more departures from Aspen Highlands after 3pm. The last departure from Maroon Bells downhill is at 5pm. Maroon Bells shuttle check-in and departures are at Aspen Highlands. Find out how to travel to Aspen Highlands by RFTA bus to catch the Maroon Bells Shuttle here.

TICKET PRICES

$16.00 FOR ADULTS

$10.00 SENIORS OVER 65

$10.00 CHILDREN UNDER 12

ONE-WAY DOWNHILL SHUTTLE TICKETS

$10.00

One-way downhill tickets will be required from the Maroon Bells Scenic Area to Aspen Highlands. We encourage tickets to be purchased in advance. The downhill ticket reservations allow RFTA to anticipate how much space will be needed each day for one-way downhill passengers hiking over from Crested Butte or other locations.

LIMITED, DAY-OF TICKETS

If limited no-show tickets are available the day of, prices will be higher. We encourage you to purchase reservations in advance.

When buses are not in operation, vehicle reservations are required to access the Maroon Bells Scenic Area.

GROUP RESERVATIONS

For groups of 15 or more, please email info@visitmaroonbells.com to see if you can be accommodated on a shuttle. These special requests need to be made at least two weeks prior to the day you would like to visit, for a minimum of 15 people, and there are no guarantees of availability. Please include a phone number to be called back on.

TRANSPORTATION BEYOND REGULAR SHUTTLE HOURS

Contact Blazing Adventures for transportation options to Maroon Bells when the RFTA shuttle is not running.

TICKET OFFICE & ARRIVAL INFORMATION

Catch the free RFTA shuttle from Ruby Park Transit center in downtown Aspen to Aspen Highlands. Parking at Aspen Highlands is $5 per hour.
